original_text: Daniel did his work much better than the other officers and rulers. He was very good at his job. Daniel was so good that the king wanted to make him ruler over the whole kingdom.
korean_text: 다니엘은 마음이 민첩하여 총리들과 고관들 위에 뛰어나므로 왕이 그를 세워 전국을 다스리게 하고자 한지라

sentences.original_text: Daniel did his work much better
sentences.korean_translation: 다니엘은 자신의 일을 훨씬 더 잘했습니다

sentences.original_text: than the other officers and rulers
He was very good at his job
that the king wanted to make him ruler
